question_text: Which TWO requirements must be met to maximize throughput using quad-channel memory? (Select two)
answer_options: Ensure all modules have ECC support
Place modules in color-matched slots based on the motherboard manual
Use only modules with heat spreaders
Overclock memory beyond the rated speed
correct_answer: Place modules in color-matched slots based on the motherboard manual
explanation: Quad-channel memory relies on balanced, matched modules and correct slot placement. Color coding helps identify the correct layout.
